Home

Registry Department

Your gateway to academic records, student services, and certification. We maintain the integrity and accessibility of all student academic information.

Department Overview

The Registry Department serves as the custodian of all student academic records and the central hub for student services from admission to graduation.

2,847

Active Students

12,500+

Alumni Records

1,250

Certificates Issued (2024)

24

Programs Registered

Our Services

Student Admissions

Processing of student applications, enrollment, and admission documentation.

Records Management

Maintenance and safekeeping of all student academic records and documents.

Graduation Services

Coordination of graduation ceremonies and issuance of certificates and diplomas.

Transcript Services

Preparation and verification of official academic transcripts and statements.

Document Verification

Authentication and verification of academic credentials and certificates.

Certification Services

Issuance of official certificates, diplomas, and other academic awards.

Service Processes

New Student Registration

  1. 1Submit completed application form
  2. 2Provide required academic documents
  3. 3Pay registration fees
  4. 4Complete medical examination
  5. 5Receive student ID and welcome package

Transcript Request

  1. 1Fill transcript request form
  2. 2Pay prescribed fees
  3. 3Submit identification documents
  4. 4Processing time: 5-7 working days
  5. 5Collection or postal delivery

Certificate Replacement

  1. 1Report loss through police abstract
  2. 2Complete replacement application
  3. 3Pay replacement fees
  4. 4Provide supporting documents
  5. 5Collect replacement certificate

Office Hours & Processing Times

Office Hours

Monday - Friday: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Saturday: 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM

Processing Times

Transcripts: 5-7 working days

Certificate replacement: 10-14 days

Verification letters: 2-3 days

Required Documents

For New Admissions:

  • Original certificates and transcripts
  • National ID copy
  • Passport photos (4 copies)
  • Medical certificate

For Services:

  • Valid identification
  • Completed request forms
  • Payment receipts
